features.name: Authentication
features.description: User login and session management with credential validation and auto-redirect to dashboard

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Business summary dashboard displaying statistics cards (customers, vendors, products, sales) and charts (sales trend, category distribution)

features.name: Point of Sale (Kasir)
features.description: Transaction processing with autocomplete for customer phone and product SKU, cart management, pricing calculations (subtotal, packing, shipping, discount), and DP/full payment options

features.name: Quotation Management
features.description: Create, view, and manage price quotations with ability to convert quotation to invoice

features.name: Product Inventory
features.description: Product catalog management with SKU, categories, stock tracking (system vs field), pricing (HPP and selling price), search, filter, and pagination

features.name: Customer Management
features.description: Customer data management with registration date, contact info, address, acquisition channel, and transaction count tracking

features.name: Vendor Management
features.description: Supplier data management including contact info, category, address, and bank account details

features.name: Transaction History
features.description: View all transaction records with order number, customer name, total amount, and actions (view/edit/delete)

features.name: Payment Settlement (Pelunasan)
features.description: Track and process down payment settlements with status tracking (DP/LUNAS) and remaining balance calculation

features.name: Invoice Generation
features.description: Generate and print invoices for full payment and down payment transactions

features.name: Layout/Navigation
features.description: Responsive sidebar navigation with collapsible menu sections and dynamic page title

features.name: Data Service Layer
features.description: Centralized data service for fetching and caching data from Google Sheets with cache-first strategy

features.name: IndexedDB Cache
features.description: Local caching using IndexedDB for offline-first experience with background refresh

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Shared utility functions for date formatting, currency formatting, phone number formatting, and loading indicators

features.name: Configuration
features.description: API endpoint configuration for Google Apps Script
